Title: Tsuki no Sango
Description: ['The story takes place in approximately the year 3000, when humankind arrived at the peak of its civilization, but is losing its will to keep living. It follows a girl, called "princess" by those around her, who lives on a small island with a fifty-person colony and a shining coral reef. She is a descendant of the Moon people, and the story focuses on how her ancestors supposedly came to Earth. ']
Characters: ['Kataribe no Shoujo', 'Tsuki no Musume', 'Kobito', 'Chikyuu no Otoko']
Staff: [['Nasu, Kinoko', 'Original Creator'], ['Takeuchi, Takashi', 'Original Character Design'], ['Chopin, Frédéric', 'Music']]
